title: Wireless RF Compliance Systems Engineer
summary: At Apple, we work every single day to craft products that enrich people’s lives. Do you love working on challenges that no one has solved yet? Do you like changing the game? As a member of our dynamic group, you will have the unique and rewarding opportunity to shape upcoming products that will delight and inspire millions of Apple’s customers every day! Apple Compliance Engineering team is looking for a candidate to do system engineering towards ensuring wireless regulatory compliance for different cellular & connectivity technologies!
description:
- Apply wireless system design/characterization knowledge towards addressing emission regulatory requirements in consumer products
- Translate emission requirements into system requirements for chipset & platform
- Architect & coordinate execution of SW features necessary for regulatory compliance
- Help pre-fetch potential emission concerns using simulation tools & schematic reviews.
- Collaborate with the engineering team to define emission test plan for custom features. This would include defining requirements for custom testing solutions and working with TE vendors.
- Assist fellow engineers in debugging regulatory emission failures.
- Experience debugging marginal/failure tests and engaging with multi-functional teams like RFHW/Antenna/Product Design/EE/etc. and drive design changes to address issues.
key_qualifications:
Industry experience in development/characterization of RF/Antenna system for wireless technologies. Experience on commercializing products for Cellular/ WLAN is required.
In-depth understanding of at least one Wireless technology including 5G FR1, FR2, GSM, UMTS, CDMA, LTE, 802.11a/b/g/n/ac/ax and Bluetooth
Experience with regulatory/industry conformance specifications for consumer products.
Experience in RF layout review radiated sub-system review and system grounding.
Experience with one of the tools like MATLAB, HFSS, CST, ADS, etc.
Understanding of regulatory features like DFS, Adaptivity, Power Table, etc. is a bonus.
Experience with radiated test methodology, equipment, 3m Chamber, etc. would be a plus.
education_experience: Bachelor's Degree with 3 or more years of relevant work experience.
